front.title: Securing Ancillary Data for Communicating with Devices in the Network

abstract.t: There is increasing need for application endpoints to exchange rich information with devices in the network and secure that information from on-path observers. This document presents some current problems and the broad strokes of potential solutions. Discussion Venues This note is to be removed before publishing as an RFC. Source for this draft and an issue tracker can be found at https://github.com/mjoras/sadcdn.
